price: Entonces le fue dicho: "Ingresa al Paraíso". Dijo: "¡Ojalá mi pueblo supiera
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
